vertex.where: *Vertex* building is walking up from A6 building. You can follow the arrows.
vertex.when: Vertex will me accessible at *open and close ceremony*. :tada:

showers.where:
Need a shower?:shower:
 You have to go to GYM building
showers.when: Saturday and Sunday morning will be open to be used

toilets.where: You will find in each floor of each building at the sides
toilets.when: They will always be open when you need it

a3.when: They will always be open when you need it

a4.when: They will always be open when you need it

a5.when: They will always be open when you need it

a6.when: They will always be open when you need it

marenostrum.when: Tours to Marenostrum will be on Friday afternoon. For more information, ask me about `BSC tour` :smile:

infodesk.where: InfoDesk is located in the intermediate level of A5 building (floor E)
infodesk.when: InfoDesk will be available during the whole weekend.

cafeteria.when: Cafeteria will be available during the whole weekend.

hacker rooms.where: First and second floors of A5 and A6 buildings. A4 First floor is open for hacking as well.
hacker rooms.when: All hacker rooms will be available during the whole weekend.

baggage.where: Baggage check-in is located in the intermediate level of A5 building (floor E)
baggage.when: Baggage check-in will be available during the whole weekend.

gym.when: Gym will be available only for Showers needs on Saturday and Sunday morning

default.when: Sorry, I don't know what place do you mean. But you can check maps.hackupc.com and you will find all possible places.
default.where: Sorry, I don't know what place do you mean. But you can check maps.hackupc.com and you will find all possible places.
default.more: For visual indications you can take a look this wonderful web :smile: maps.hackupc.com

help: Want to know about HackUPC venue? You can ask me about :arrow_down:
- Where are some places: Bathrooms, hackers rooms, showers...
- Some places have opening hours. Ask me about they scheduled.
